title: A Softer World remixes book! (Kickstarter)
description:
DEAR FRIENDS

Long long ago and far far away, we made a photo comic about feelings and weirdos and jokes that might not be jokes after all. After some time, we gradually built up 
an audience!

And that was great.

Every once in a while, weâ€™d get an anxious email from one of those readers, letting us know that Someone Out There was Ripping Us Off! Then thereâ€™d be a link to a Livejournal page with some very familiar comics - they used the A Softer World template and often our own text, but the photos had been replaced. Theyâ€™d been replaced by stills from movies, television shows, sports. People were imagining the inner lives of their favourite characters, and using Joeyâ€™s words to illuminate those lives.

The people who let us know about these remixes seemed to think weâ€™d be angry, but we loved it! It was a novel way to contribute to a bourgeoning fanfiction culture. So we thought weâ€™d try our hand at it, ourselves. And this booklet is the wildly illegal result!

- Joey & Emily
asofterworld.com
